branding.welcomeText: Welcome to SiteTrips. Your One-Stop Destination for Healthy & Nutritious Food!
branding.tagline: Pure, natural, and healthy - no chemicals, refined sugar, preservatives or artificial additives for a better lifestyle!

menu.products: Discover a wide range of nutritious and wholesome foods!
menu.about: Committed to a healthier you. Click to know about us.

contact.title: Follow Us
contact.description: Stay connected on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.

contact.title: Address
contact.description: Durganagar, Chandrampalem, Madhurawada, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh - 530041

faq.title: How can I contact customer support?
faq.description: You can reach our support team via email at hello@milletvaan.com or call/watsapp us at +91 9666030129.

faq.title: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.description: We accept credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and wallets.

faq.title: How can I track my order?
faq.description: You can track your order from the 'My Orders' section after logging in.

faq.title: What is your return policy?
faq.description: We offer a 7-day return policy for most products. Check the return policy on the product page for details.

faq.title: Do you offer cash on delivery (COD)?
faq.description: Yes, COD is available for select locations. Check availability at checkout.

faq.title: How long does delivery take?
faq.description: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days, while express delivery takes 1-2 days.

slides.contentText: No checmicals, preservatices, refined sugar, or additives for a better lifestyle!.
The way to healthy life style.

features.title: Money Back Guarantee
features.description: Not happy? Get a full refund, no questions asked.

features.title: 24x7 Online Support
features.description: Always here, anytime you need us.
